description: I am a Higher Technician in Web Development, with experience as a designer and programmer in both front-end and back-end. I am passionate about technology and the possibilities it offers to transform ideas into impactful digital experiences. I love to stay in constant learning, exploring new tools, design trends, and the latest innovations in development, especially in the fascinating world of Artificial Intelligence.
approach: My focus is not only on the code but also on creating attractive, functional solutions tailored to each need.
languages: Native Spanish speaker with an intermediate level of English.
